job.name: Bing Speech Service
job.description: The cloud-based Microsoft Speech API provides developers an easy way to create powerful speech-enabled features in their applications, like voice command control, user dialog using natural speech conversation, and speech transcription and dictation. The Microsoft Speech API supports both Speech to Text and Text to Speech conversion.
